| History                 = '''Shi'ar Solutions Consolidated''' is a [[Shi'ar]] corporation operating on [[Earth]] among other places.

Frr'Dox, the Supreme Director of Interstellar Operations, met with the heads of various companies from across the globe to discuss [[Dario Agger (Earth-616)|Dario Agger]]'s operations in the [[Ten Realms]], threatening him of having problems in interstellar customs if he didn't proposed to share that "new market".{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 8}}
